title: State Statutes Search
description: Search state statutes by keyword, proximity, and wildcard

search.sql: SELECT documents.filename, documents.state, documents.year, documents.page_count, snippet(documents_fts, 3, '[', ']', '...', 25) as context FROM documents JOIN documents_fts ON documents.rowid = documents_fts.rowid WHERE documents_fts MATCH :query ORDER BY rank
search.title: Search Statutes
search.description: Enter a search term. Use * for wildcard (legislat*), NEAR(word1 word2, 10) for proximity search.
